record.id: field.name="name" and file.name="cm3rcategory" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: name
record.file.name: cm3rcategory

brief.brief: It can reflect a general name, such as datacenter or software or a specific name, such as dasd or program.

detail.detail: Each Request or Task Category can have one or more Phases. You can define any number of Phases per Category.

A Phase is a grouping of activity, a logical step, or a checkpoint within a repeatable implementation cycle. For instance, the Phases for the Category "job" could be test, qa, and prod. The Phases for the Category "program" could be jcl, proc, documentation, program, and scheduling.
A Phase can have any number of Tasks .
